title: WTB Ty Cobb red background graded

posts.post_title: WTB Ty Cobb red background graded
posts.post_content:
I have 1400 in my PayPal looking for the nicest card that fits my budget. Prefer PSA but would consider SGC
I'm a front card kinda guy so hoping for something with a stain/crease on the back 

Any help would be greatly appreciated

-Chris
Card found thanks for all the help/emails
